name: testDeactivateAndActivateCompanyUser
description: Deactivate and activate user under company admin
descriptionHtml: Deactivate and activate user under company admin
statusMessage:
Locator expected to have text: SUCCESSUser was activated successfully Received: Call log: - Locator.expect with timeout 5000ms - waiting for locator("[role='alert']") 5 × locator resolved to
…
- unexpected value "SUCCESSUser was deactivated successfully"

steps.name: Login with 'admin.email@gmail.com' user and change password
Enter the user's email in the 'Email' field
Enter the user's password in the 'Password' field
Enter the user's password in the 'New password' field
Enter the user's password in the 'Repeat new password' field
Press 'Save' button to save changed password
Enter the user's email in the 'Email' field
Enter the user's password in the 'Password' field
Click on 'System administration' menu in Header
Set checked 'Allowed business units' checkboxes by business units names
Verify: status of the user was changed
